p: In an attempt to perpetuate, different organisms evolved different lifestyles, and one such lifestyle is to live on other organisms as a parasite or pathogen. The organisms attacked by the pathogens or parasites are referred to as hosts. The host and pathogen continue to learn from each other, wherein the pathogen tries to dominate the host and the host tries to suppress the pathogen, which can be compared to the newer strategies adopted by two competing nations to dominate each other.
